Nutjobs took over then the ETs or God come in, obliterateus and start over? ... argh that rant went right off base LOL Tags for, saucy notables and Breaking News:The list is getting lengthy and if you don't have a Pro account you can't hit the star and favourite an account/Gabber so I've created a topic which you can do that to.
